page.title: 06LEISURE
page.content: A wide varitety of pastimes are to be found in the vicinity of{Weeley Heath. There is no hobby in which more than 15% of the population participate. The most popular hobby is gardening, which 14% of the people do. This multitude of gardeners brings many welcome customers to the various{nurseries}and garden centres in the area. Shooting and riding are equally popular with 8% of the people doing them, making them the second most popular hobbies. The horses and guns are owned principally by farmers with grazing land to spare. Among the women, knitting, needlework and crocheting are the most prominent activities, with reading being the common denominator for all.
